meanings.definition: To put forward or offer for consideration
meanings.sent1: She will obtend her idea at the meeting tomorrow.
meanings.sent2: He obtends his opinion confidently during discussions.
meanings.sent3: The students obtended their project proposals with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent4: The lawyer obtended evidence to support her case.
meanings.sent5: The chef obtended a new recipe for the menu.

meanings.definition: To present or show in a clear or definite way
meanings.sent1: The teacher obtends the lesson with visual aids.
meanings.sent2: The map obtends the route to the destination clearly.
meanings.sent3: The magician obtends his tricks to the audience with flair.
meanings.sent4: The artist obtends emotions through their paintings.
meanings.sent5: The scientist obtends the results of the experiment accurately.
